title: EasyUCS ucs system config unified_uplink_ports section
description: EasyUCS ucs system config unified_uplink_ports section JSON schema

fabric.description: Fabric ID of Unified Uplink Port ("A" or "B")

slot_id.description: Slot ID of Unified Uplink Port

port_id.description: Port ID of Unified Uplink Port

aggr_id.description: Aggregate ID of Unified Uplink Port (for Breakout Ports)

user_label.description: User Label of Unified Uplink Port

flow_control_policy.description: Flow Control Policy assigned to Unified Uplink Port

link_profile.description: Link Profile assigned to Unified Uplink Port

admin_speed.description: Admin Speed of Unified Uplink Port

admin_state.description: Admin State of Unified Uplink Port

fec.description: FEC value of Unified Uplink Port
